name: smith
description: Excellent service from start to finish. All staff concerned were very helpful and endevoured to solve the issue with the product. I've used Einhell tools for a fair few years now and never had a problem with any of them.

name: smith
description: The free battery that I was meant to receive didn't arrive and after contacting Customer Services discovered there was a mix up with the post code. Found the response from CS excellent and the new battery arrived shortly afterwards.

name: smith
description: Excellent service from Ash at Einhell, needed a replacement part urgently and it was a slick and easy process to get this delivered. Great experience, thank you Ash , well recommended :)
